item.title: Tomb Garden of Iul(ia) Victorin(a) in Scarbantia
item.description: Province Pannonia Province Description Location Scarbantia Scarbantia (Pleiades) Location Description Sublocation Sublocation Description Garden Tomb Garden of Iul(ia) Victorin(a) in Scarbantia Keywords epitaphs stelae tombs viridarium Garden Description A limestone funerary stele of probably third century date unearthed in 1973 near Scarbantia at Winder am See (Burgenland) and now in the Burgenl√§ndische Landesmuseum at Eisenstadt records an epitaph set up by Septimius Alcides, a veteran of the legio XIII Gemina Iulia, for his wife, Iul(ia) Victorin(a), dead at thirty, for whom he built at his own expense a funerary pleasure garden (viridarium).
